an10.62:1.1: “Bhikkhus, this is said: ‘No first point of craving for being is evident, before which there was no craving for being, and afterwards it came to be.’
an10.62:1.2: Still, it is evident that ‘craving for being depends on this.’
an10.62:2.1: I say that craving for being has its nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.2: And what is the nutriment for craving for being?
an10.62:2.4: I say that ignorance has its nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.5: And what is the nutriment for ignorance?
an10.62:2.7: I say that the five hindrances have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.8: And what is the nutriment for the five hindrances?
an10.62:2.9: You should say: ‘The three kinds of misconduct.’
an10.62:2.10: I say that the three kinds of misconduct have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.11: And what is the nutriment for the three kinds of misconduct?
an10.62:2.12: You should say: ‘Lack of sense restraint.’
an10.62:2.13: I say that lack of sense restraint has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.14: And what is the nutriment for lack of sense restraint?
an10.62:2.16: I say that lack of recollection-and-awareness has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.17: And what is the nutriment for lack of recollection-and-awareness?
an10.62:2.18: You should say: ‘Attention not in light of the origin.’
an10.62:2.19: I say that attention not in light of the origin has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.20: And what is the nutriment for attention not in light of the origin?
an10.62:2.22: I say that lack of faith has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.23: And what is the nutriment for lack of faith?
an10.62:2.24: You should say: ‘Not listening to the true teaching.’
an10.62:2.25: I say that not listening to the true teaching has its nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:2.26: And what is the nutriment for not listening to the true teaching?
an10.62:2.27: You should say: ‘Not associating with true persons.’
an10.62:3.1: In this way, when the factor of not associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of not listening to the true teaching. When the factor of not listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of lack of faith … attention not in light of the origin … lack of recollection-and-awareness … lack of sense restraint …the three kinds of misconduct … the five hindrances. When the five hindrances are fulfilled, they fulfill ignorance.  When ignorance is fulfilled, it fulfills craving for being.
an10.62:3.2: That’s how craving for being is nourished, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.62:4.1: It’s like when it rains heavily on a mountain top, and the water flows downhill to fill the hollows, crevices, and creeks. As they become full, they fill up the pools. The pools fill up the lakes, the lakes fill up the streams, and the streams fill up the rivers. And as the rivers become full, they fill up the ocean.
an10.62:4.2: That’s how the ocean is nourished, and that’s how it’s filled up.
an10.62:5.1: In the same way, when the factor of not associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of not listening to the true teaching. When the factor of not listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of lack of faith … attention not in light of the origin … lack of recollection-and-awareness … lack of sense restraint …the three kinds of misconduct … the five hindrances. When the five hindrances are fulfilled, they fulfill ignorance.  When ignorance is fulfilled, it fulfills craving for being.
an10.62:5.2: That’s how craving for being is nourished, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.62:6.1: I say that knowledge-and-liberation has its nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.2: And what is the nutriment for knowledge-and-liberation?
an10.62:6.3: You should say: ‘The seven awakening factors.’
an10.62:6.4: I say that the seven awakening factors have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.5: And what is the nutriment for the seven awakening factors?
an10.62:6.6: You should say: ‘The four foundations of recollection.’
an10.62:6.7: I say that the four foundations of recollection have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.8: And what is the nutriment for the four foundations of recollection?
an10.62:6.9: You should say: ‘The three kinds of good conduct.’
an10.62:6.10: I say that the three kinds of good conduct have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.11: And what is the nutriment for the three kinds of good conduct?
an10.62:6.13: I say that sense restraint has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.14: And what is the nutriment for sense restraint?
an10.62:6.16: I say that recollection-and-awareness has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.17: And what is the nutriment for recollection-and-awareness?
an10.62:6.18: You should say: ‘Attention in light of the origin.’
an10.62:6.19: I say that attention in light of the origin has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.20: And what is the nutriment for attention in light of the origin?
an10.62:6.22: I say that faith has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.23: And what is the nutriment for faith?
an10.62:6.24: You should say: ‘Listening to the true teaching.’
an10.62:6.25: I say that listening to the true teaching has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.62:6.26: And what is the nutriment for listening to the true teaching?
an10.62:6.27: You should say: ‘Associating with true persons.’
an10.62:7.1: In the same way, when the factor of associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of listening to the true teaching. When the factor of listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of faith … attention in light of the origin … recollection-and-awareness … sense restraint …the three kinds of good conduct … the four foundations of recollection … the seven awakening factors. When the seven awakening factors are fulfilled, they fulfill knowledge-and-liberation.
an10.62:7.2: That’s how knowledge-and-liberation is nourished, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.62:8.1: It’s like when it rains heavily on a mountain top, and the water flows downhill to fill the hollows, crevices, and creeks. As they become full, they fill up the pools. The pools fill up the lakes, the lakes fill up the streams, and the streams fill up the rivers. And as the rivers become full, they fill up the ocean.
an10.62:8.2: That’s how the ocean is nourished, and that’s how it’s filled up.
an10.62:8.3: In the same way, when the factor of associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of listening to the true teaching. When the factor of listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of faith … attention in light of the origin … recollection-and-awareness … sense restraint …the three kinds of good conduct … the four foundations of recollection … the seven awakening factors. When the seven awakening factors are fulfilled, they fulfill knowledge-and-liberation.
an10.62:8.4: That’s how knowledge-and-liberation is nourished, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.”
